name: XENSIV Angle Sensor TLx5012B
keywords: hall, sensor, magnetic, kit2go, XENSIV, TLE5012B, TLI5012B
description: This library enables the Infineon XENSIV(TM) TLx5012B magnetic angle sensor. The XENSIV(TM) TLx5012B is a pre-calibrated 360 degree angle sensor that detects the orientation of a magnetic field, including a sophisticated digital signal processor. The sensor is available as Kit 2Go and as bulk chip.
